    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

            <entry>cahi1:data_94734</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Melting of ice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schmelzen des Eises</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonte de la glace</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Derretimento do gelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fusione del ghiaccio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τήξη του πάγου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El derretir del hielo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows three ice cubes at different surrounding temperatures. To melt an ice, it must take in energy from its surroundings.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Temperature</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt drei Eiswürfel bei den 
unterschiedlichen umgebenden Temperaturen. Um ein Eis zu 
schmelzen, muß sie in der Energie von seinen Umlagerungen nehmen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre trois cubes en glace aux 
différentes températures environnantes. Pour fondre une glace,
elle doit prendre dans l'énergie de ses environnements.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra três cubos do gelo em 
temperaturas circunvizinhas diferentes. Para derreter um gelo, 
deve fazer exame na energia de seus arredors.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra tre cubi del ghiaccio 
alle temperature circostanti differenti. Per fondere un 
ghiaccio, deve prendere nell'energia proveniente dai relativi 
dintorni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τρεις κύβους πάγου στις 
διαφορετικές περιβάλλουσες θερμοκρασίες. Για να λειώσει 
έναν πάγο, πρέπει να πάρει στην ενέργεια από τα περίχωρά του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra tres cubos del hielo en
diversas temperaturas circundantes. Para derretir un hielo, debe
tomar en energía de sus alrededores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Luft</string>
          </keyword>
